summary: Pornhub is a popular website for sharing adult content, with millions of visitors worldwide. It offers a range of pornographic videos, including professional and amateur content, which users can also upload themselves. Following concerns about non-consensual content and sex trafficking, Pornhub made changes to its platform in 2020, removing videos from unverified users. The website continues to face opposition, which is explored in a 2023 documentary, "Money Shot: The Pornhub Story."
title: Pornhub
